#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair
#define pp pair<ll, ll>
#define pp2 pair<pp, pp>
#define fi first
#define se second
#define esp 1e-9
#define MAXN 2000002
#define mod 1000000007
typedef long long ll;
using namespace std;
set <int> col[100100];
int d[100100];
int mask[100100];
int k, n;
bool vis[100100];
vector <int> a[100100];
ll ret = 0;

void join(int u, int v) {
    if (col[mask[u]].size() < col[mask[v]].size())
        swap(mask[u], mask[v]);

    int id = mask[v];
    int root = mask[u];
    /** union two set **/
    for (set<int>::iterator it = col[id].begin(); it!=col[id].end(); it++) {
        int value = (*it);
        if (col[root].count(value) == 0)
            col[root].insert(value);
    }
}

void dfs(int u) {
    vis[u] = true;
    for (int i = 0; i < a[u].size(); i++) {
        int v = a[u][i];
        if (vis[v] == false) {
            dfs(v);
            join(u, v);
        }
    }
    ret += col[mask[u]].size();
}

int main() {
    //freopen("in.in", "r", stdin); freopen("ou.ou", "w", stdout);
    cin>>n>>k;
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++)
        mask[i] = i;

    for (int i = 2; i <= n; i++) {
        int kk;
        cin>>kk;
        a[kk].pb(i);
        a[i].pb(kk);
    }

    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++){
        int kk;
        cin>>kk;
        if (col[i].count(kk) == 0)
            col[i].insert(kk);
    }
    dfs(1);
    cout<<ret;
    /**/return 0;
}
